CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Initial Inquiries stage positioned above or below the Property Listed stage?
SRP.A: The Initial Inquiries stage is positioned {below} the Property Listed stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Post-sale Survey?
VE.A: The value of stage Post-sale Survey is {65}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Negotiation?
VE.A: The value of stage Negotiation is {187}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Property Listed?
VE.A: The value of stage Property Listed is {434}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Property Listed, with a value of {434}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Post-sale Survey, with a value of {65}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Sale Closed to stage Post-sale Survey?
SC.A: Decreased by {15} Properties from stage Sale Closed to stage Post-sale Survey.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Property Viewed to stage Negotiation?
SC.A: Decreased by {86} Properties from stage Property Viewed to stage Negotiation.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 302? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Property Listed} stage has {434}, the {Initial Inquiries} stage has {331}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 110? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Sale Closed} stage has {80}, the {Post-sale Survey} stage has {65}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 110 and 230? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Negotiation} stage has {187}, the {Contract Signed} stage has {141}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Sale Closed to Post-sale Survey, or from stage Contract Signed to Sale Closed?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Contract Signed} to {Sale Closed} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Contract Signed to Sale Closed, from stage Property Viewed to Negotiation, or from stage Initial Inquiries to Property Viewed?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Property Viewed} to stage {Negotiation} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Property Listed} and {Initial Inquiries} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Sale Closed} and {Post-sale Survey} stages.
